analysis.key_quote: I strongly oppose instituting this rule; having professional government employees who can build up expertise in their area to execute policy, do research, and understand the law is incredibly important, rather than forcing them out of the government every time the administration changes.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the rule and emphasizes the importance of retaining experienced public servants, which aligns with concerns about merit-based systems and the potential for politicization of civil service.
